QuestData.Title: Strike While the Iron is Hot
QuestData.Description: With the Heart of the Mangaron, we wield a powerful weapon against the Iron Horde.$b$bThey amass far to the north at the Iron Approach. This will not be easy, but we must seize the opportunity to deal a blow to the Iron Horde while we possess the artifact.$b$bWe are prepared to depart at your command. Speak with Grinslicer when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Grinslicer to fly to the Iron Approach and attack the Iron Horde.
